channel.title: CVE Feed for Part-DB -- Part-DB-server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Part-DB -- Part-DB-server

item.title: CVE-2023-26042|2024-08-02T11:39:06.446Z -- part-db -- part-db-server
item.description: Part-DB is an open source inventory management system for your electronic components. User input was found not being properly escaped, which allowed malicious users to inject arbitrary HTML into the pages. The Content-Security-Policy forbids inline and external scripts so it is not possible to execute JavaScript code, unless in combination with other vulnerabilities. There are no workarounds, please upgrade to Pat-DB 1.0.2 or later.
